Name: Fantasy Mosaics 25: Wedding Ceremony
About the game: Uncle Aaron and mysterious lady Una are getting married! They've found a wonderful landscape to have the wedding ceremony! Now it's your turn to help them decorate it and get challanged with a new collection of colorful mosaic puzzles! Discover the images hidden in the logic of numbers and be a guest at the penguins wedding! - Colorful mosaic puzzles - Interactive island creatures - Help decorate the landscape - Puzzles based on logic
